TEXT.English: "Maximum Compatibility" will allow save games to be loaded into later versions of the mod (in most cases) but is larger and a little slower to load & save. It is also currently beta functionality.[NEWLINE]"Original BTS" is the save format Civ4 used previously. It is more compact and a little faster to load & save, but normally will not support game loading between releases of a mod.
TEXT.French: "Maximum Compatibility" will allow save games to be loaded into later versions of the mod (in most cases) but is larger and a little slower to load & save. [NEWLINE]"Original BTS" is the save format Civ4 used previously. It is more compact and a little faster to load & save but normally will not support game loading from a previous release of a mod.
TEXT.German: "Maximum Compatibility" will allow save games to be loaded into later versions of the mod (in most cases) but is larger and a little slower to load & save. [NEWLINE]"Original BTS" is the save format Civ4 used previously. It is more compact and a little faster to load & save but normally will not support game loading from a previous release of a mod.
TEXT.Italian: "Maximum Compatibility" will allow save games to be loaded into later versions of the mod (in most cases) but is larger and a little slower to load & save. [NEWLINE]"Original BTS" is the save format Civ4 used previously. It is more compact and a little faster to load & save but normally will not support game loading from a previous release of a mod.
TEXT.Spanish: "Maximum Compatibility" will allow save games to be loaded into later versions of the mod (in most cases) but is larger and a little slower to load & save. [NEWLINE]"Original BTS" is the save format Civ4 used previously. It is more compact and a little faster to load & save but normally will not support game loading from a previous release of a mod.

TEXT.English: The %s1 in the City of %s2 has shut down to a lack of fresh water.
TEXT.French: The %s1 in the City of %s2 has shut down to a lack of fresh water.
TEXT.German: The %s1 in the City of %s2 has shut down to a lack of fresh water.
TEXT.Italian: The %s1 in the City of %s2 has shut down to a lack of fresh water.
TEXT.Spanish: The %s1 in the City of %s2 has shut down to a lack of fresh water.

TEXT.English: Provides a free %s1 in every city on the same continent.
TEXT.French: Provides a free %s1 in every city on the same continent.
TEXT.German: Provides a free %s1 in every city on the same continent.
TEXT.Italian: Provides a free %s1 in every city on the same continent.
TEXT.Spanish: Provides a free %s1 in every city on the same continent.

TEXT.English: Provides a free %s1 in every city connected by your trade routes.
TEXT.French: Provides a free %s1 in every city connected by your trade routes.
TEXT.German: Provides a free %s1 in every city connected by your trade routes.
TEXT.Italian: Provides a free %s1 in every city connected by your trade routes.
TEXT.Spanish: Provides a free %s1 in every city connected by your trade routes.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Settling more than %d1 cities will cause %d2 unhappiness in every city for each one over that limit
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Settling more than %d1 cities will cause %d2 unhappiness in every city for each one over that limit

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Settling more than %d1 cities will cause %d2 unhappiness in every city for each one over that limit

TEXT.English: +%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: Our inept government's attempts to over-expand are making us unhappy
TEXT.French: +%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: Our inept government's attempts to over-expand are making us unhappy
TEXT.German: +%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: Our inept government's attempts to over-expand are making us unhappy

TEXT.Spanish: +%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: Our inept government's attempts to over-expand are making us unhappy

TEXT.English: No explicit limits or penalties from civic choices for founding any number of cities
TEXT.French: No explicit limits or penalties from civic choices for founding any number of cities
TEXT.German: No explicit limits or penalties from civic choices for founding any number of cities
TEXT.Italian: No explicit limits or penalties from civic choices for founding any number of cities
TEXT.Spanish: No explicit limits or penalties from civic choices for founding any number of cities

TEXT.English: No fixed border mechanics, whether from civics or any other source
